pr_title: Fix unreachable pattern issue in nested match-stmt

timeline.bodyText: Don't think we need a method here. If we want a method it is good if we can make line 850 to a method call to make things consistent.
timeline.author: KRVPerera

replies.bodyText: IMO, it's OK to have a method, but yeah I agree that we should then change other usage too.
replies.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText:
Where do we get "s3" and "s4" from? Do these tests run?
I seem to be getting a compilation error for constPattern14 - this function must return a result - which again is not correct because the function does return for all scenarios within the match statement.
timeline.author: MaryamZi

replies.bodyText: Fixed. I tested this with PR #27292. Therefore those changes were moved here.
replies.author: KavinduZoysa

timeline.author: MaryamZi
MaryamZi
MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: Do we need both wildCardMatchPattern.isLastPattern and wildCardMatchPattern.matchesAll? Going by the expression, seems like the check is rather for something like matchesAny?
timeline.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure if checking matchGuard == null will always produce correct results. See #27603
timeline.author: MaryamZi

replies.bodyText: I will check matchGuard related issues separately.
replies.author: KavinduZoysa

timeline.bodyText: Noticed this in several places although not introduced by this PR? Can matchExpr be null?
timeline.author: MaryamZi

replies.author: KavinduZoysa

timeline.author: MaryamZi
MaryamZi
MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: Since we removed matchesAll and rely on isLastPattern now, shouldn't we set isLastPattern to true here?
timeline.author: MaryamZi

replies.bodyText: It is set in CodeAnalyser because it is related to code analysing.
replies.author: KavinduZoysa

timeline.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: Instead of adding a new field hasLastPattern to BLangMatchStatement, I think we should be able to extract this information based on just this.hasLastPatternInStatement.
timeline.author: MaryamZi
MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: We can do this when visiting BLangMatchStatement, before L803, right? Or we will be doing this assignment and re-assignment in L864 per clause even if there is no match statement in the clause?
timeline.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: We can move this logic to the visit of BLangMatchClause, right? We can probably get rid of the hasLastPatternInClause global variable by doing so.
timeline.author: MaryamZi
